title: Elon Musk Says Rivian Has Yet to Face its True Test
sub_head: Tesla CEO’s remarks come after rival electric-vehicle maker’s blockbuster IPO
body:
Tesla Inc . Chief Executive Elon Musk said the true test for rival electric-vehicle maker Rivian Automotive Inc . will be high production and break-even cash flow.
“There have been hundreds of automotive startups, both electric & combustion, but Tesla is [the] only American car maker to reach high volume production & positive cash flow in past 100 years.,” Mr. Musk said in a tweet Thursday.
